events.name: Space Robotics Competition
events.summary: Compete to complete tasks using the NED2 robot for a chance to win a $100 gift card!

events.name: Re-shoring and Re-Tooling: The Semiconductor Industry’s Challenge to Academia
events.summary: An afternoon event to celebrate the importance of the semiconductor sector to Canada’s economy. Join our experts for presentations, a panel, and lab tours!

events.name: UNHack 2024: Collaborate, Innovate, and Tackle Real-World Challenges!
events.summary: A collaborative problem-solving experience where students tackle real-world challenges, fostering creativity, teamwork, and entrepreneurial thinking to develop innovative solutions for sustainability and social impact.

events.name: Annual Canadian Celebration of Women in Computing Conference (CAN-CWiC)
events.summary: The premier event for young women and non-binary individuals in technology. This conference has provided opportunities for networking, learning, and mentoring.

events.name: Climathon 2024
events.summary: Calling experts, changemakers, developers, designers, strategists, social innovators and students to hack climate solutions for the Greater Toronto Area (GTA)! This weekend event engages participants from diverse backgrounds to contribute to climate action by creating impactful solutions.

events.name: Lassonde Engineering Society Fall Semi-Annual General Meeting
events.summary: Get to know the Lassonde Engineering Society, provide feedback, see constitutional changes, custom merch, free food and more!

events.name: Co-op & Internship Information Session
events.summary: Co-op is an optional program for students to gain paid, hands-on learning and industry experience. If you meet the academic eligibility requirements, be sure to take advantage of this fantastic work-integrated learning opportunity.

events.name: Interview fundamentals workshop
Drop-in Advising with Career Peer Educators
events.summary: Whether you need feedback on your resumé, preparing for interviews or navigating job postings, our Career Peer Educators are available at the Career Lounge to help you!
events.location: 202 McLaughlin College and in York Lanes, or virtually through Experience York
